title: feat: add OVH Whisper speech-to-text transcription
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: The hive is listening
gist.blurb: We've added Whisper Large V3 to the API! Now you can turn your spoken buzzing into perfectly transcribed text.
gist.summary: Integrated OVHcloud's Whisper Large V3 model to provide high-quality speech-to-text transcription endpoints.
gist.impact: Developers can now build voice-enabled apps that transcribe audio to text with simple per-second billing.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee mascot wearing large retro headphones, listening to a pixelated microphone. Sound waves are flowing into the microphone and coming out as pixel text bubbles. The background is the signature lime green and pastel gradient.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute 8-bit bee mascot wearing big retro headphones and holding a pixelated microphone. Sound waves transform into floating text bubbles. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Like Stardew Valley meets a recording studio. Emotionally warm, nostalgic but beautiful.
